class.rdfs:comment:
An article, such as a news article or piece of investigative report. Newspapers and magazines have articles of many different types and this is intended to cover them all.

See also blog post.
class.rdfs:label: Article

schema:articleBody.rdfs:comment: The actual body of the article.
schema:articleBody.rdfs:label: articleBody

schema:articleSection.rdfs:comment: Articles may belong to one or more 'sections' in a magazine or newspaper, such as Sports, Lifestyle, etc.
schema:articleSection.rdfs:label: articleSection

schema:pageEnd.rdfs:comment: The page on which the work ends; for example "138" or "xvi".
schema:pageEnd.rdfs:label: pageEnd

schema:pageStart.rdfs:comment: The page on which the work starts; for example "135" or "xiii".
schema:pageStart.rdfs:label: pageStart

schema:pagination.rdfs:comment: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd; for example, "1-6, 9, 55" or "10-12, 46-49".
schema:pagination.rdfs:label: pagination

schema:wordCount.rdfs:comment: The number of words in the text of the Article.
schema:wordCount.rdfs:label: wordCount
